description:
Flats happen, whether they are of the pinch variety, or your running tubeless and got too close to a thorny bush, this little pump will help you get back on your bike. An internal hose makes inflation a breeze to get you back on the saddle in no time.

  • Reversible universal head fits Schrader and presta valves
  • Extendable hose takes alignment out of the equation and makes inflation easier
  • Rugged aluminum construction
name: MEC Hand Pump
